00054 GUIEdgeControlBuilder::GUIEdgeControlBuilder()
00055     : NLEdgeControlBuilder() {}

00061 MSEdge*
00062 GUIEdgeControlBuilder::closeEdge() {
00063     MSEdge* ret = NLEdgeControlBuilder::closeEdge();
00064     static_cast<GUIEdge*>(ret)->initGeometry();
00065     return ret;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 MSLane*
00070 GUIEdgeControlBuilder::addLane(const std::string& id,
00071                                SUMOReal maxSpeed, SUMOReal length,
00072                                const PositionVector& shape,
00073                                SUMOReal width,
00074                                const SUMOVehicleClasses& allowed,
00075                                const SUMOVehicleClasses& disallowed) {
00076     MSLane* lane = 0;
00077     switch (myFunction) {
00078         case MSEdge::EDGEFUNCTION_INTERNAL:
00079             lane = new GUIInternalLane(id, maxSpeed, length, myActiveEdge,
00080                                        myCurrentNumericalLaneID++, shape, width, allowed, disallowed);
00081             break;
00082         case MSEdge::EDGEFUNCTION_NORMAL:
00083         case MSEdge::EDGEFUNCTION_CONNECTOR:
00084             lane = new GUILane(id, maxSpeed, length, myActiveEdge,
00085                                myCurrentNumericalLaneID++, shape, width, allowed, disallowed);
00086             break;
00087         default:
00088             throw InvalidArgument("A lane with an unknown type occured (" + toString(myFunction) + ")");
00089     }
00090     myLaneStorage->push_back(lane);
00091     return lane;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 MSEdge*
00097 GUIEdgeControlBuilder::buildEdge(const std::string& id, const std::string& streetName) {
00098     return new GUIEdge(id, myCurrentNumericalEdgeID++, streetName);
00099 }
